item.title: Johnson Controls International plc 10-K
item.description: Johnson Controls International plc, which is in the Air Cond & Warm Air Heating Equip & Comm & Indl Refrig Equip [3585] industry, SEC 10-K filing on November 15, 2022 had 41475 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 808 instances 2022 - 353 instances september - 316 instances financial - 290 instances tax - 282 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
